name: Gramma's Old Fashioned Chili Mac
author: Sue
summary: This is an old family recipe that my mom has cooked for 50 years. It's a  wonderful, 'stick-to-the-ribs' meal that goes wonderful with warm cornbread or rolls. I find that kids love this when they don't like regular 'spicy' chili. Enjoy!
ingredients: ½ large green bell pepper, chopped
directions: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
In a small saucepan, simmer celery and green pepper with water to cover until tender; Drain
Place ground beef in a large heavy skillet over medium heat
Add onion, and cook until tender and translucent
Stir in kidney beans, condensed tomato soup, diced tomatoes and brown sugar
Season with salt and pepper, and stir in macaroni
